ARABIC: فَكُلُوا۟ مِمَّا غَنِمْتُمْ حَلَٰلًا طَيِّبًا وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: So make full use of any booty you have taken which is halal and good; and have taqwa of Allah. Allah is Ever-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But now use such of the spoils as are lawful and good, and fear God, for God is forgiving and kind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: So eat that which you have obtained - for it is lawful and clean--and fear Allah. Surely Allah is Ever-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Use what you have acquired (from the battle) as your own good, lawful property. Have fear of God; He is All-forgiving and All-merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Therefore benefit from the booty you have received, lawful and good; and keep fearing Allah; indeed Allah is Oft Forgiving, Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So enjoy what you have gotten of booty in war, lawful and good, and have Taqwa of Allah. Certainly, Allah is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Eat then of the lawful and good (things) which you have acquired in war, and be careful of (your duty to) Allah; surely Allah is Forgiving, Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Eat of what you have taken as booty, such as is lawful and good; and fear you God; surely God is All-forgiving, All-compassionate.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Now enjoy what ye have won, as lawful and good, and keep your duty to Allah. Lo! Allah is Forgiving, Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: So eat of that which you have gained in war as lawful and good, and fear God. Surely, God is most forgiving and merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Eat ye then of that which ye have obtained of spoi1, lawful and clean, fear Allah; verily Allah is Forgiving, Merciful
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Avail yourselves of the spoils you have taken as lawful and good, and be wary of Allah. Indeed Allah is all-forgiving, all-merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But (now) enjoy what ye took in war, lawful and good: but fear Allah: for Allah is Oft-forgiving, Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So enjoy what you have gotten of booty in war, lawful and good, and be afraid of Allah. Certainly, Allah is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Eat of what you have taken from the spoils; such is lawful and good, and fear Allah. Allah is Forgiving and Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So consume what you have gained, legitimate and wholesome; and remain conscious of God. God is Forgiving and Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So consume what you have taken of war booty [as being] lawful and good, and fear Allah. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [8:69] Now eat of what you have plundered, as lawful and good, and fear God. Truly God is Forgiving, Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Now enjoy what ye have won) at Badr of spoils of war, (as lawful and good, and keep your duty to Allah) and fear Allah regarding this. (Lo! Allah is Forgiving) He overlooks transgressions, (Merciful) regarding that which ensued from you at Badr concerning the ransom of prisoners.
